vulnerability.name: USN-4572-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4572-1 fixed a vulnerability in Spice. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Frediano Ziglio discovered that Spice incorrectly handled QUIC image  decoding. A remote attacker could use this to cause Spice to crash,  resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: Spice could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
